Source API¶

This API houses documentaion on each of the modules in the ADAM source code. This information is not pertinent for users only, however, this is where this project can be developed and improved! The domain of problems enabled by the current setup is by no means complete. More information on what can be solved as-is with the curent ADAM project can be found at the User’s Guide

  • ADAM Control Module
  • Derivatives
  • Pixel
  • SCALE Interface
  • Cluster Interface
